title: Audio Transcription and Summarization
description: Transcribe audio with Whisper/ffmpeg and produce structured, timestamped summaries and action items.
author: claudepro
content:
# Audio Transcription + Summarization

End-to-end workflow for local transcription and concise summaries, including diarization basics and timestamped notes.

## Key Operations
- ffmpeg conversion and normalization
- Whisper transcription
- Timestamped notes and summaries
- Diarization basics

examples.title: Transcribe with Whisper CLI
examples.code:
# Convert to mono 16kHz WAV
ffmpeg -i input.mp3 -ar 16000 -ac 1 input.wav

# Python whisper (pip install -U openai-whisper)
whisper input.wav --model small --language en --output_format txt

examples.title: Summarize timestamps (Python)
examples.code:
from pathlib import Path

text = Path('input.wav.txt').read_text(encoding='utf-8')
# Split by timestamps like [00:12:34]
# ... produce bullet summaries per 5-minute window ...
print(text[:500])

steps: Install whisper via pip or build whisper.cpp

troubleshooting.solution: Install ffmpeg via your package manager and ensure it is on PATH.
Downmix to mono, apply noise reduction, and use a larger model.
